# DSPDoubleSplitComplex

**Type Alias**

Used to represent a double-precision complex number when the real and imaginary parts are stored in separate arrays.

## Declaration

```swift
typedef struct DSPDoubleSplitComplex DSPDoubleSplitComplex;
```

## Fields

- **realp**: An array of real parts of the complex numbers.
- **imagp**: An array of imaginary parts.

## Instance Properties

- **realp**

items.description: An array of real parts of the complex numbers.
items.name: realp
